Hassan Kassem

Cincinnati ,OH · (513) 663-2273 · hassanskassem@outlook.com

Senior DevOps Engineer with 6+ years of experience automating and streamlining cloud infrastructure. Skilled in AWS, Kubernetes, and Terraform, with strong CI/CD expertise (GitHub Actions, GitLab). Adept at building secure, scalable, and resilient systems across AWS and GCP. Passionate about solving complex problems and enabling fast, reliable deployments.

Interests

Outside of my professional work, I am passionate about cooking and experimenting with Mediterranean and international cuisines from traditional Lebanese dishes to homemade pizza and yogurt. I enjoy perfecting recipes and sharing them with family.

Beyond tech and cooking, I enjoy gardening, kayaking, and spending quality time with my family. I am continuously exploring new cloud and DevOps tools as personal projects to learn, improve, and share knowledge.
